</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 80</row>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This complicated snare is affixed with various crystals and Stasian coils attached to strange electrical relays, working on the same principles as etheric [spirit singers](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1138). When an [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creature enters its square, the device lets loose an ectoplasmic web that lashes around the creature's spectral form. The creature must succeed a DC 26 Reflex saving throw or become [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature becomes immobilized for 1 minute. In either case, the incorporeal creature can attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 26).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
